name: market for soybean meal | soybean meal | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/19509/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'soybean meal', in the geography of Brazil.;This is dataset represents the transport of 1 kg of soybean meal from the milling facility to the farm that soybean meal is used as animal feed. No losses are considered in this dataset.;The product 'soybean meal' is an animal feed from milled soybeans. 'Soybean meal' is produced by means of solvent extraction (pre-cracking of soybeans, dehulling, oil extraction and meal processing) in a oil mill producing soybean meal and crude oil. The meal and hulls are later consumed as animal feed.

The activity starts at the gate of the milling plant.

The activity ends with the provision of soybean meal to the farm that is used as animal feed.
category: C:Manufacturing/10:Manufacture of food products/104:Manufacture of vegetable and animal oils and fats/1040:Manufacture of vegetable and animal oils and fats

processDocumentation.technologyDescription: The data are intended to reflect current equipment and processes on a Brazilian level.
